name: MARIO TENNIS™ OPEN
description:
MARIO TENNIS OPEN on
Nintendo 3DS offers players tactical
tennis with depth like never before!
Use buttons, the Touch Screen or new
gyro controls - perfect for beginners!
Play online against friends or
challengers from your region and work
your way up the leaderboard to
become champion. Exchange data with
other users via StreetPass and
customise your player with any coins
you win.
